metadata.title: CVE-2024-21808 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper buffer restrictions in some Intel(R) VPL software before version24.1.4 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation ofprivilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
onevpl-intel-gpu package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
